verses.roman:
sandhinīra sāra aṁśa--'śuddha-sattva' nāma
bhagavānera sattā haya yāhāte viśrāma

synonyms: sandhinīra—of the existence potency; sāra—essence; aṁśa—portion; śuddha-sattva—śuddha-sattva (pure existence); nāma—named; bhagavānera—of the Supreme Personality of Godhead; sattā—the existence; haya—is; yāhāte—in which; viśrāma—the resting place.
translation: The essential portion of the sandhinī potency is śuddha-sattva. Lord Kṛṣṇa's existence rests upon it.
